heading: David prays for preservation from his persecutors.
verses: with my voice; with my voice unto the
I poured out my complaint before him; I shewed before him my trouble.
within me, then thou knewest my path. In the way wherein I walked have they privily laid a
no man that would know me: refuge failed me; no man
my portion in the land of the living.
Attend unto my cry; for I am brought very low: deliver me from my persecutors; for they are stronger than I.
out of prison, that I may praise thy name: the righteous shall compass me about; for thou shalt deal bountifully with me.
